alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 11 at 12:53PM PST until January 12 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South to Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Oregon Coast from Cape Blanco south to Brookings. This impacts parts of Highway 101. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds can blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
